activities: Brierley+Partners provides Loyalty and Data Warehousing services to it's clients.  These services are performed in Brierley's co-location data center and corporate data center where personal information may be transmitted to for the purposes of Data Warehousing and the Loyalty programs we host.  All data maintained within Brierley+Partners systems is done so on it's clients behalf and the client retains ownership of the data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: 1) On-line data = data collected directly on the Internet. 2)Offline data = any digital data processed not through the Internet – such as data collected through an Intranet. 3)Manually processed data = data collected manually – paper, trade shows, etc.
recoursemech: TRUSTe - Private sector developed dispute resolution mechanisms that incorporate the Safe Harbor framework.
